ygData.subject: Re: Starting a paladin
ygData.msgSnippet: I have decided that i will play either a human or dwarf paladin and will like to ask some questions. Any help is greatly appreciated. 1)  Will human gets alot
ygData.messageBody:
I have decided that i will play either a human or dwarf paladin and will
like to ask some questions. Any help is greatly appreciated.

1) Will human gets alot less HP per level at 80 STA than dwarf which has 95
STA?

2) I will like to know how do i distribute the points to make the dwarf
paladin better in melee( more STR, STA, AGI or DEX , which stat is better?)

3) does human paladin level alot faster than dwarf paladin?

4) Do dwarf paladins get very lousy prices when buying or selling at 55
charisma compared to a human 85 (how significant is the difference), will
charisma affect the prices when u deal with your own guild ?

5) Anyone has any formula in calculating Hitpoint gained per level? Is the
difference significant for a 80 STA and 95 STA?




David Rogers wrote:

> From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
> --- Dragon <dracon@...> wrote:
> > Will Dwarf's 60 INT makes increment in skill point
> > REAL slow??
>
> I haven't had any unplayable problems. My skills are
> all level capped; only took me 1 1-2 levels to bring
> Parry up from 17 to 90 (at 18th). I brought Archery
> up to 75 in about 5 hours. I have a -2 under level
> cap Swimming, capped Sense Heading, 56 Fletching, 55
> Smithing, etc....
>
> ===
> :D
> Dave's World
> -No matter where you go, there you are-
> "People will believe a lie either because they want to
> believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
